module.uhc.flash_mcqueen.description: Permanent haste III and a lot speed
module.uhc.half_health.description: Cuts the health of players by half
module.uhc.loots.animal_cooked_food.desc: Many animals drop cooked food in larger quantities
module.uhc.loots.blasted_ores.descriptio: All ores get automatically smelt, doubled and bring more experience
All leaves only drop apples in larger quantities
module.uhc.loots.mob_cooked_food.descrip: Many mobs drop cooked food in larger quantities
module.uhc.loots.need_for_resources.desc: All stones types drop cobblestone, gravel drop arrows, sand drop glass, cactus drop planks, dead bushes drop bread, mushrooms drop stews and more entities drop leather
module.uhc.ore_balance.description: Lapis, gold and diamond ores are more frequent and can be found at any level
module.uhc.timberman.description: Trees get cut instantly and drop oak planks
text.uhc.dropped_players: Players have been dropped on the map.
text.uhc.no_longer_immune: You are no longer immune to damages!
text.uhc.shrinking_finish.countdown_text: The world will stop shrinking in %s.
text.uhc.shrinking_when_pvp: The world will start to shrink as soon as PvP gets enabled!
text.uhc.vulnerable.countdown_text: You will be vulnerable to damage in %s.
text.uhc.world_will_shrink: You will get teleported in %s. The world will then start shrinking and PvP will get enabled.
